mapper.select: select healthlog_Id, pet_id, write_date, water_status, food_status, poop_cnt, symptom, healthlog_memo, created_dt, updated_dt from healthlog_tb where pet_id = #{petId} AND write_date = #{writeDate} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into healthlog_tb ( pet_id, write_date, water_status, food_status, poop_cnt, symptom, healthlog_memo, created_dt, updated_dt ) values ( #{petId}, #{writeDate}, #{waterStatus}, #{foodStatus}, #{poopCnt}, #{symptom}, #{healthlogMemo}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update healthlog_tb set water_status = #{waterStatus}, food_status = #{foodStatus}, poop_cnt = #{poopCnt}, symptom = #{symptom}, healthlog_memo = #{healthlogMemo}, updated_dt = NOW() where healthlog_id = #{healthlogId}
